summary: Build “Mix Daily” (mixdaily.in), a modern premium AI & digital tools directory website (English, future Hindi-ready) with card-based UI, SEO-friendly tool pages, search/filter/sort, pagination, admin panel, monetization, newsletter, and prefilled with 1000 real verified tools (no placeholders).
architectural_notes: Design system: modern/premium/clean, no animations; minimal hover effects; generous whitespace; mobile-first; Inter font; theme colors/background (#F4F1FF) and rounded cards (~16–18px).

Tool data quality rules: no placeholder tools/text; verify tool exists; no duplicates; official name/logo/homepage only; rewrite descriptions (18–25 words) without copying; rel="nofollow noopener" on outbound links.
SEO requirements: indexable Home/Categories/Collections/Tool pages; meta title/description template; structured data schemas (SoftwareApplication, Product, Breadcrumb).
Performance target: 90+ page speed; image optimization + lazy loading.

existing_features.title: Add admin authentication using Internet Identity sign-in on the frontend and an admin allowlist of principals stored in the backend; only allow allowlisted principals to access admin APIs and the admin UI routes.

Implement bulk tool upload via CSV in the admin panel, with CSV validation enforcing: official product name, unique tools (no duplicates), 18–25 word description, single allowed category, correct pricing tag, official homepage link, and an icon URL that points to the official logo/favicon source.

Build the public frontend pages and navigation matching the provided structure: Header with “Mix Daily” logo text, menu (Home, Collections, Categories, Submit Tool, About), search bar, and “Add Your Tool” CTA linking to /submit; and the Home page sections (hero with headline/subheadline/search, featured collections, categories grid, and “Daily New Tools Added” section).

Implement the tools listing UI with the specified tool card design: logo (64x64 square, transparent/white background), tool name, 18–25 word description, pricing badge (Free/Freemium/Paid with specified badge colors), category, and “Visit Tool” button opening the official link in a new tab with rel="nofollow noopener"; include pagination (60 per page) and integrate search/filter/sort controls.

Create the Tool Detail page using SEO-friendly URLs and render the required sections (Overview, Key Features, Pricing Type, Use Case, Official Website Link, Similar Tools) with a consistent card-based layout; include breadcrumb navigation.

Add SEO support on indexable pages (Home, Categories, Collections, Tool Pages) including meta title/description per the provided structure and JSON-LD schema types (SoftwareApplication or Product as appropriate, plus Breadcrumb).

Implement the “Submit Tool” page as a public form that creates a pending ToolSubmission in the backend, plus an admin review UI to approve/reject submissions and convert approved submissions into published tools.
Add newsletter signup UI (phase 1) that stores email signups in the backend (no external email service integration) and provide an admin view to export the collected emails.

Apply the provided UI theme and layout rules consistently across the frontend: background #F4F1FF, primary #6B4EFF, secondary #FFD84D, Inter font, bold headings, generous spacing, border radii ~18px, modern premium clean look, mobile-first, no animations, minimal hover effects.

Add legal/compliance UI elements: site-wide disclaimer (“Mix Daily does not own these tools...”), ensure outbound tool links use the specified rel attributes, and include placeholders for monetization placements while enforcing “max 2 ads per page” at the layout level (without integrating external ad scripts).
Prepare the frontend for future Hindi support by adding an i18n-ready structure (English as default) without changing current English copy or adding Hindi translations yet.

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement full web frontend + backend for Mix Daily tools directory website
Homepage UI: hero search, featured collections, categories grid, daily new tools section (auto-update)
Tools listing: tool cards (logo, description, pricing tag, category, visit button) + pagination (60/page)
Tool detail pages with SEO-friendly URLs and sections (overview, features, pricing, use case, official link, similar tools)
Search, filters (Free/Paid/AI Based/Popular/New) and sorting (Newest/Most Popular/Alphabetical)
Admin panel: add/edit/delete tools, bulk CSV upload, category management, featured tools control, SEO meta editor

Seed database with 1000 real verified AI & digital tools following strict data rules (official names, official links, real logos, rewritten 18–25 word descriptions, correct pricing, single allowed category)
SEO + monetization + compliance: indexable pages, schema (SoftwareApplication/Product/Breadcrumb), AdSense limits (max 2 ads/page), affiliate/featured/sponsored, legal disclaimers
Newsletter signup (phase 1) and future-ready hooks (Hindi support readiness, phase 2: reviews/bookmarks)

Create the core data model and persistence in the single Motoko main actor for a tools directory, including: Tool (name, icon URL, description, category, pricing tag, official link, createdAt, updatedAt, popularity/featured flags), Category (from the allowed set), Collection (e.g., “Top 10 AI Tools Today”), and ToolSubmission (public “Submit Tool” entries pending admin review).

Implement backend query APIs to support the public directory UX: list tools with pagination (60 per page), full-text search across tool name/description/category, filtering (Free, Paid, AI Based, Popular, New), and sorting (Newest, Most Popular, Alphabetical).

Implement backend tool detail retrieval by SEO-friendly slug/URL key derived from the official tool name, and include data needed to render the tool detail page sections: Overview, Key Features, Pricing Type, Use Case, Official Website Link, and Similar Tools.

Implement admin-only backend APIs for: add/edit/delete tools, category management, collection management (including featured collections), featured tools control, and SEO meta editor fields per tool/page as specified in the SEO meta structure.

Seed the app with an initial dataset of 1000 real, verified AI and digital tools that follow the provided tool data rules (no placeholders, no fake descriptions, no duplicates; official names, official homepage links, correct pricing tag, one allowed category; 18–25 word neutral descriptions).
